tiles.name: Entrance Sector
tiles.description: Ruined concrete and metal walkways. Evidence of a past collapse. High magic presence detected.

tiles.name: Connecting Junction
tiles.description: A network of metal walkways connecting different sections. Dormant security drones are located here.

tiles.name: Submerged Passageway
tiles.description: Flooded section, possibly connected to the underground aquifers. Navigation is difficult.

tiles.name: Data Processing Hub
tiles.description: A partially functional server room. Corrupted data streams emanating from this sector.

tiles.name: Central Data Repository
tiles.description: The core of the Obsidian Archive. Contains vast amounts of (mostly) intact data.

tiles.name: AI Control Nexus
tiles.description: Once the heart of the archive's security. Now dormant, with traces of ancient technology.

tiles.name: Collapsed Stairwell
tiles.description: A partially collapsed stairwell. The Glimmer hotspot presence is quite strong.

tiles.name: Maintenance Corridor
tiles.description: A narrow corridor used for maintenance. A possible hidden passage is located here.

tiles.name: Restricted Archives
tiles.description: Vaults containing highly sensitive and dangerous information. Heavy security was once in place.
